subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Kimi Raikkonen drove from fourth place on the grid to victory 55 laps later at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix on Sunday, but the race was just as notable for the heroics of Sebastian Vettel and Fernando Alonso.
snippet: Kimi Raikkonen drove from fourth place on the grid to victory 55 laps later at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix on Sunday, but the race was just as notable for the heroics of Sebastian Vettel and Fernando Alonso.
